title: Textile, ca. 1919
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: warp printed on compound satin
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Broad piece of ribbon with a woven gold design of large circles filled with geometric motifs. Chiné printed in a pattern of solidly massed multi-colored and large-scale ornamental and floral forms. Both selvages present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1919.Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: warp printed on compound satin. Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg. 1938-82-137-e.
